title: Login fails with invalid password
description: When user enters incorrect password, system crashes instead of showing error message. Affects frontend.

title: Payment processing error
description: Payment fails when using credit card with expired date. No error message displayed.

title: User profile image not loading
description: Profile pictures fail to load after recent deployment. Console shows 404 errors for image URLs.

title: API timeout during data export
description: CSV export requests timeout after 5 minutes for large datasets. No progress indicator shown.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: Android version 3.1.4 crashes immediately after splash screen on Pixel 6 devices.

title: Search results pagination broken
description: Clicking page 2 of search results displays empty list. Pagination controls remain active.

title: Email notifications not sent
description: Users not receiving password reset emails. SMTP connection times out after 30 seconds.

title: Date picker displays wrong timezone
description: Calendar widget shows UTC times instead of local timezone. Affects event scheduling.

title: Database connection leaks
description: Connection pool exhausted after 2 hours of normal use. Requires server restart.

title: PDF export formatting issues
description: Tables overflow page margins in generated PDF reports. Affects all Chrome users.

title: Cache invalidation failure
description: Updated product prices not reflecting until cache manually cleared. Occurs in 30% of cases.

title: iOS push notifications delayed
description: Notifications arrive 15-20 minutes after trigger event. APNs connection unstable.

title: Password complexity rules too strict
description: Special character requirement blocking valid passwords. Error message unclear.

title: Order history sorting broken
description: Recent orders not appearing first when sorted by date. Database query returns unsorted.

title: Memory leak in image processing
description: Server memory usage grows 2% per hour when processing PNG files. Critical after 48 hours.

title: Dark mode toggle not persistent
description: UI reverts to light mode after page refresh. Cookie settings not saved.

title: Currency conversion rounding errors
description: USD to EUR conversions off by ±0.01€ in checkout totals. Affects 5% of transactions.

title: API rate limiting too aggressive
description: Legitimate users getting 429 errors after 10 requests/minute. Needs dynamic adjustment.

title: Drag-and-drop upload fails
description: Files over 50MB cause silent failure in Chrome. Console shows CORS errors.

title: Session timeout too short
description: Users logged out after 5 minutes of inactivity. Should be 30 minutes per policy.
